about_the_game:
Hatred: Subscribe or Die - Official comic book vol.1
"...Lilith (Lily) Johnson has lived the life most girls could only dream of.
A former child actor, Lily spends her days being a bad girl.. always in the paparazzi's lens.
Recently taking to Etseon to earn money from her male fan base, Lily has become something of a sex symbol sensation selling lewd photographs and videos of herself to those who can afford them..."

content_descriptors.notes:
This comic book contains:
- Nudity and Sexual Content related to the story.
- Frequent Violence caused by gunfights.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel®Core i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2 GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel®Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
